q: How secure is my journal data?
a: Your journal entries are encrypted and only accessible to you. We use industry-standard security practices to ensure your thoughts remain private.

q: Can I access my journal on multiple devices?
a: Yes, your journal syncs across all your devices, allowing you to write and reflect wherever you are.

q: Are there any writing prompts available?
a: We offer daily prompts to inspire your journaling practice and help you explore new perspectives.

q: Can I export my journal entries?
a: Yes, you can export your entries in various formats including PDF and plain text for safekeeping or printing.
